reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012
reviews.text: We stayed here on our honeymoon for a week. Definitely worth the money. We had ZERO problems, and we WILL be back!! The food was great, and our room was comfy. Loved having hammocks everywhere. And the glass bottom boat tour was wonderful!
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really nice hotel, got a room with an amazing view, reception staff a bit stiff but remainder of staff super. Didn't like the fact that they charge different prices depending on where your from. The Buffett was amazing with so much to choose from, the beach was right outside our door. Would most definitely come back.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just arrived home late last night from a 6 day stay at the RDMB. I had a great time, but then I have a great time no matter where I travel.
reviews.title: Our Stay and Honest Review

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As previously stated the hotels is aged but kept very clean..our room was above the pool bar.
reviews.title: It's what you make it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at 3 in the afternoon and check in was a breeze, extra fee for safe which in my opinion is silly...I would think all inclusive is all inclusive. And while they have wifi it is $5 dollars an hour which can be used over 24 hour period or $20.00 a day and really only works in the lobby..
reviews.title: another great vacation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Older hotel that is somewhat dated but still in fairly good shape. The size is both a plus and a minus depending upon your point of view. If you like five restaurants, huge entertainment venues, bars everywhere and an almost infinite number of personal options than forget this place. They have one buffet restaurant, a snack bar and an a la carte restaurant that has selected hours. A small nightclub and nightly entertainment in an open theater. Naturally the food selected is decreased as is entertainment with the small size but my personal taste is I prefer this environment over the combination DisneyWorld/casino ones such as the Palladium.
reviews.title: Good Not Great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What you do get is a great beach, a nice garden area and a more relaxed environment with no need for a golf cart to get around. The rooms are not spacious but almost all have an ocean view and a small patio. After all this resort is long in the tooth.
reviews.title: Booked Threw Expedia Room In B.F.E.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I found staff a mixed bag. The dinner staff seemed to just not be as customer oriented as the breakfast and lunch staff. I tip despite this being all inclusive and tip well but if you can't even follow through after filling my water glass you get squat.
reviews.title: Wonderful place except beach!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A big issue is the exorbitant charge for a lost safe key ($100) and fees for a lost key or towel card. I can see a room key since they use a lock system but a towel? $20 - Too much! Then you have a $20 daily charge for wireless. I have never seen higher.
reviews.title: Ok for the price paid

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The big deal though is the bang for the buck. They have a mini Sandals almost across the street that would have cost us $300 more.
reviews.title: No frills

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here July 2011. (Sorry for the late review) this resort was okay for a last minute trip. I rarely plan trips far in advance so I am always looking for the best deal for the price I want to pay. I wanted a reasonable place to stay for a week because I planned on going on excursions 3 out of the 5 days I was there and this fit the bill.
reviews.title: it was okay...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: This is a smaller, older resort but it was kept really clean and tidy. The rooms needed to be upgraded, especially the bathrooms but they were still clean and comfortable. The elevator was really tiny. I have never seen one that small before. Depending on how much luggage you have only 1 or 2 people can fit in it at a time. Despite the size it worked fine, and all of the rooms are accessible by the steps anyway so it wasn’t an issue.There is also a small beach that never seemed to be crowded so if felt like our own private beach most of our stay.
reviews.title: Nice holiday in Jamaica

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The food was pretty good. There was a lot of variety, especially if you enjoy jamacian food. There were also basic things to choose from for people woul don’t perfer spicy food. The only thing major that I remember being disappointed in was the alocohol. It seemed reall y watered down. Luckily the resort is in the city so there are vendors and stores around. I would suggest walking to the liquor store and getting your own alcohol.
reviews.title: Fantastic staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Outside of the resort can be a little intimidating for some that are not used to that type of environment. There is a lot of traffic, so much that it can be hard to cross the street. There are also many vendors trying to get your attention to sell things to you. Simply keep walking or say no thank you and they will leave you alone. Most of the people were actually really friendly helping the torrist cross the busy street and giving directions to the different places in walking distance. Even though the hotel is in a busy area I felt safe being there. There is a gate with security that will not let anyone that is not staying at the resort in.
reviews.title: Horrific. Terrible.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall I had a good time while I was there. I picked this resort at the last minute and it fit my needs as a comfortable place to stay to visit Motego Bay. I was off the resort most of the time doing excursions so it was a good place to come back and relax. If you are looking for a resort that you plan on staying there the entire time then this might not be a good choice for you because of the size. Otherwise it was okay. I had a great time but I probably with pick a higher end resort next time I visit sicen I plan on laying around the beach and drink next time instead of being on the go for most of the trip.
reviews.title: A wonderful place to stay, true vacation from life back home!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have written over 120 reviews on Trip Advisor and take providing feedback seriously. My wife and I have been using Trip Advisor for years to research all our vacations. I hope you find my review helpful.
reviews.title: Affordable and Clean Mediocrity

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: My wife and I found this tiny 3 star resort using Tripadvisor.com. We knew this was not a 4 star resort going in, so we lowered our expectations. I will provide a quick review and below I will provide a detailed review.
reviews.title: Meh

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: Quick Review: 3 star resort delivers 3 stars mediocrity all around. Unless I have to stay in Montego Bay, I would NEVER go back to this particular resort, even though it is quite affordable and clean. The negatives of this resort clearly outweigh the positives. Resort cleanliness, including rooms, is its greatest strength. However, the beach, quality of their food, and poor front desk service are clearly their greatest weaknesses. When I go back to Jamaica, I will stay in Negril, no question. There you will find real beaches. Please see below for more details.
reviews.title: No regret choosing this Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Guide/Taxi Tip: My wife and I got really lucky and found a local tour guide/taxi driver named Derrick. He was awesome and prices were very reasonable. We used him 4 days in a row to see the country and to go to local restaurants. He is not online yet, but he was very friendly, personable, engaging, knowledgeable and just fun to be with. I would recommend him to anyone that wants to get off the resort in the Montego Bay area. I’ve used guides all around the world and Derrick is a class act. He was always on time, always smiling, and always ready to share stories with us about Jamaica. If you are in the Montego Bay area, you should give him a call and tell him Steve and Tanya from Texas sent you. Derrick: 876-337-0026 or 876-598-9510.
reviews.title: Excellent Resort and Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Strengths:
reviews.title: I Really Like This Resort
